metadata.title: CVE-2023-7024 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Heap buffer overflow in WebRTC in Google Chrome prior to 120.0.6099.129allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via acrafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
